column1: Faqus is identical with the ancient city of Phacusa (Ancient Greek: Φάκουσα Phákousa)
column2: which was the capital of the nome of Arabia.  It was subsequently mentioned by the medieval geographers Qudama ibn Ja'far
column7: and al-Muqaddasi.The 1885 Census of Egypt recorded Faqus as a nahiyah under the district of Sawaleh in Gharbia Governorate; at that time
